summary: Requiem 1.8 patch for INIGO V2.0 by Smartbluecat
descriptionHtml:
Requiem 1.8.x patch for INIGO V2.0 by Smartbluecat

Inigo V2.0 has been adjusted to match Requiem's values.
[u]
[/u][i][b]*Note: Only Inigo and his equipment has been patched, Inigo's quest has not been altered/modified.*[/b][/i]


New [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59996/?]Interesting NPCs Followers Perk Addon[/url] available. Options are available for Perkus Maximus 1.x and Requiem 1.8.x.


[u]Installation:[/u]
Use NMM, MO, or just extract Requiem - Inigo V2.0.esp into your Skyrim/Data folder.

[u]Load order:[/u]
Use LOOT or place Requiem - Inigo V2.0.esp after Requiem and Inigo and before Requiem for the Indifferent.

Skyrim.esm
....
....
....
Inigo.esp
....
Requiem.esp
....
Requiem - Inigo V2.0.esp
....
Bashed Patch, 0.esp                    <--- if you use Wrye Bash
Requiem for the Indifferent.esp


[u]Credits/Thanks:[/u]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/?]Requiem[/url]: Ogerboss and Xarrian
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40960/?]INIGO[/url] : Smartbluecat
author: spikyfishy
